## Stats from scratch project

The mean is defined as $$ \frac{1}{n} x \cdot  \sum_{n=1}^{n=k} n $$


````{r mean}
my_mean<-function(variable){
  x = sum(variable)/length(variable)
  return(x)
}

something<-c(1,20,22,7,4)
mean(something)
my_mean(something)

````
